attributes.action: Give an equal amount of money to the Church of England to maintain churches as is being given to build new mosques
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our Churches are falling into disrepair and being sold off as there is no money to maintain them.  It seems only right that the same amount of money should be given to the Church of England as is being provided to build new mosques.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
